      • searchKeywordAutocomplete

        public java.util.List<ShoppingKeywordDTO> searchKeywordAutocomplete​(ShoppingKeywordDTO keywordDTO)
        Keyword search autocomplete.
        Parameters:
        keywordDTO - the keyword dto. Keyword field must not be null or empty.
        Returns:
        list of keywords that are the closest match. List size limited by the MAX_RESULTS value.

      • findCategoryByKeyword

        public ShoppingCategoryDTO findCategoryByKeyword​(ShoppingKeywordDTO keywordDTO)
        Find category by keyword. Returns one result. If nothing found. assign "Uncategorized"
        Parameters:
        keywordDTO - the keyword dto. Keyword field must not be null or empty.
        Returns:
        closest matching category.

        Returns:
